short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes Chrome tab groups as soon as they are created.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you had enough of those pesky tab groups automatically being created and interrupting your workflow and peace of being? Look no further, this extension will auto-close them faster than you can start being annoyed.

Looking out for you.
